page.title: 17Life-styles Holidays
page.content: {Sarah}One day we went on the boat.My Dad was pretending to be James Bond and was walking along the side of the boat. There was a lump sticking up and I said,"Dad! watch out!" But it was to late. He tripped and fell in.I shouted,"Mam!David!Come here!Quick!" They came and we all helped pull Dad up. {Holiday Survey }20 families told us about their holidays. Do you go away on holiday? Yes 18 No 2. Do you stay in a Tent 3 Caravan 3 Chalet 7 BB 0 Hotel 5 with friends or relations 2 In which country do you usually take your holidays? England 12 Scotland 3 GT Britain 5.What do you like most about holidays? Weather scenery swimming food spending money sun bathing.
